sentences.sContent: I've personally never subscribed to the view that either sex is superior to the other.
sentences.sCn: 我个人从未持有过一种性别比另一种性别优越的观点。

synos.tran: 订阅；捐款；[经]认购；赞成；签署

remMethod.val: sub(下面) ＋ scribe(写) → 写下订单 → 订购

trans.tranCn: 捐款, 订阅, 签署(文件), 赞成, 预订
trans.tranOther: to pay money regularly to be a member of an organization or to help its work
